column5: I didn't want to hijack the "Best fishing pics" thread, so I thought I'd re-post the picture here of your new future fishing partner!    Congrats bro-in-law!  Who'd have thunk you could have a part in something that cute!!!
Congratulations Alex!!!   ... she can borrow your earrings when she gets a little older.
Congrats Alex, a new fishing partner is born  Joey
Congrats. Those pants would make a nice hard bait design.
